nodes.text: Hammer 4:3 was a S-1 FireHawke Heavy Repulsortank in the Imperial Hammers Elite Armor Unit. During the Battle of Turak IV, it sustained severe damage and was left behind by the rest of the regiment. It became a centerpoint of combat itself, as Rebel and Imperial retrieval teams, both determined to retrieve the vehicle, clashed.
The crew of Hammer 4:3 consisted of five elite Imperial Army assault troopers, armed with blaster carbines and blaster pistols.
